The picture they have on here doesn't do the restaurant any justice.  Go to their website.  It's a really nice, cozy restaurant that feels like home (somehow).  Ample of space between tables so you can have your intimate dinner/conversation.  The food was great, too!  It was a couple of blocks from the flat where I was staying and I would have gone here for my lunch every day (if I was not all over Barcelona during the day).Will definitely go back.
